title: Water Sound Samples
longDescription:
Your ears are thirsty too - drown them in these 222 HÂ²0 sound effects!


Previews

Interactive Water SFX: https://youtu.be/ZuHaTvQnLLo

Ambiance Samples: https://youtu.be/wOa4JYD9t6w

Sound Sample List: https://youtu.be/dOo-Mr8LVCQ

Dungeon Sample Update: https://youtu.be/kCyd-5iLJOA


Asset List

Water Sound Samples Asset List



Produced and used for Simulation - proven to work in a real application


I always wanted to have my own library of good creek/water flowing sfx for my projects so I created this package which I will now share with you. Some of these sounds are used in an archviz simulation for a water purification system company. I added other sounds like rain, underwater recordings and some backwash sounds too.


Plans for the next updates

  • Water splashes
  • Ocean sounds/coast sounds
  • Wooden ships / boats inside water
  • Water dripping and wet cave/dungeon ambiance
  • More or longer underwater recordings
  • More Waterfall Sound Samples
  • Motorboat Sound Samples



Customer Service


As always feel free to add any questions, requests or any issue with this package on the projects page question section

As with all my products, I will continue to improve them and add further samples to the packages as a free service.

You can visit my Unreal Engine Forum Support thread here
technicalDetails:
Technical Information


These Sounds are leveled at -6db , so they are very loud. Use them with the right attenuation settings so that you only need to care about the loudness by distance. This is intentional, because it simulates the loudest level you could hear if you hold your ear next to the sound source. If you want to make the rain more faint and gentle for example, you have to level it down. Also, these sounds are made to be as dry as possible. Add reverb to your sound mix if needed (like in a cave or a forest)


Number of Audio Waves: 222

Number of Audio Cues: 222

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: 66 loops included , 156 non loop sounds

Minutes of audio provided: 29:04 (mm:ss)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
